features: Removes Plaque, Fights Gingivitis: The Natural Dentist Healthy Gums Antigingivitis/Antiplaque Rinse is an herbal/botanical alcohol-free mouthwash that provides gentle plaque fighting, germ killing, breath freshening, moisturizing, and soothing oral care to adults and children over 12, including those who are undergoing chemotherapy

Clinically Proven: An effective bleeding gums treatment, this natural mouth rinse is clinically proven to help bleeding gums and kill germs, helping to reverse early signs of the gum disease gingivitis

Made with Natural Ingredients: This gingivitis mouthwash is made with 20% purified aloe vera to soothe and prevent bleeding gums; echinacea, an anti-inflammatory; goldenseal and grapefruit seed extract, both antibacterials; and calendula, an aid to wound healing

No Harsh Chemicals: A soothing gum disease treatment, Healthy Gums Antiplaque/Antigingivitis Rinse is alcohol-free, gluten-free, fluoride-free, cruelty-free, sulfate-free, vegan, and contains no artificial flavors, colors, or sweeteners; Available in two flavors, Peppermint Twist and Orange Zest, which is perfect for those with mint allergies or sensitivities

Safe for Chemo Patients: The Natural Dentist Healthy Gums Antigingivitis/Antiplaque Rinse is a gentle and effective mouthwash for chemo sores to use in the relief of oral side effects associated with cancer treatment
body.description: Nature’s answer to bleeding gums! The Natural Dentist Healthy Gums Antigingivitis/Antiplaque Rinse, an herbal/botanical mouthwash, provides gentle plaque fighting, germ killing, breath freshening, moisturizing oral care to adults and children over 12. Gentle enough for patients to use as mouthwash for chemo sores, this natural mouthwash can help to reverse signs of the gum disease gingivitis when used as a regular part of your brushing and flossing regimen. Our mouthwash for gum disease is made with natural ingredients like purified aloe vera to soothe and prevent bleeding gums, anti-inflammatory echinacea, the antibacterials goldenseal and grapefruit extract, and calendula to aid in wound healing. The Natural Dentist Healthy Gums Mouthwash is alcohol-free, gluten-free, fluoride-free, cruelty-free, sulfate-free, contains no harsh chemicals, and is made with no artificial flavors, colors, or sweeteners. Clinically proven to help bleeding gums and kill germs, Healthy Gums Antigingivitis/Antiplaque Rinse is available in two flavors, Peppermint Twist and Orange Zest, which is perfect for those with mint allergies or sensitivities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it says!
reviews.reviewText: This has a nice mint flavor,and has helped with my bleeding gums. There's no harsh stinging. It ispleasant tasting, and leaves my mouth feeling fresh and clean. I like that there's no crazy ingredients in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just in time!
reviews.reviewText: For a long time, I have struggled with a white film on my tongue. Recently, I tried The Natural Dentist Peppermint Twist Mouthwash and was totally surprised! First, it's alcohol free, so it doesn't burn your mouth. This wonderful natural peppermint flavor does it's job extremely well and works great for all around Doral health care. The best part is that this amazing Mouthwash removes the white gunk when garbled.Oh! The price isn't bad either. 😉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective and flavorful
reviews.reviewText: Unlike most mouthwashes this product does not leave a burning sensation in the mouth but a very pleasant aftertaste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: Great product, but the deal on one bottle was broken and it leaked during shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thanks to this Rinse, my Gums no longer bleed!
reviews.reviewText: Before I started using this mouthwash, my Gums were bleeding every time I brushed my teeth and my Gums were red, not a healthy pink.Well, my last dentist visit, both my Hygenist and my Dentist said that my Gums were pink and the condition of my Gums were much improved. Even my Gum Pockets went from 4.5 to mostly 3's. My Gums no longer bleed when I brush, however, I am still using this mouthwash every time I brush. This product is worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Have been using this for years and it's not always easy to find in the store. Does not burn my mouth, tastes okay, and definitely helps with healing gums!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Longtime Favorite, Economical Option Discontinued
reviews.reviewText: I've been a fan of The Natural Dentist Healthy Gums Rinse for years. It's effective, and I've seen positive results. However, I'm a bit disappointed as they recently discontinued the 3-pack option, making it less economical. Still, a reliable choice for oral health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this product works great. it freshness and is not too bitter or acidic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this because I am pregnant and have been struggling with nausea/sensitivity to strong scents and my usual minty mouth products were overwhelming to use. I found this and an orange toothpaste and switched off the mint- it has helped! I don't have to psych myself up to battle for dental hygiene! There is no burn or unnatural sugary feeling while using this- its not a fight to keep it in your mouth long enough for it to work! The flavour is more like an orange Calippo or popsicle than it is to orange juice but it rinses clean without leaving any coating behind. I can immediately have food and drink without worrying how mint is going to make my yogurt taste horrible. My partner got curious and envious (because mint mouthwash + cereal & milk = gross) and tried this too- and loves it! Now we are switching longterm and this is our regular mouthwash.

After just 2 days of use, not only are my gums healthier and happier but my geographic tongue has become almost completely normal. I love this product because it is completely natural and gets 100% rating by Yuka. It is a great product which is now something I will continue to use and highly recommend to my friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn't irritate my mouth and tastes okay!
reviews.reviewText: It doesn't irritate my mouth so it's been a great mouth wash! I've gone through the whole thing without any adverse reactions and it doesn't taste too strong either. Good for a clean mouth honestly.
Has rejuvenated my gums so much that the Dentist has asked me how I’m doing it! I went from regular bleeding gums to super healthy gums now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: It works for bleeding gums but not for your breath
reviews.reviewText: This is very pricey but it actually works. The only negative is that the flavour isn't that great. Initially it tasted like a flat orange soda and now it's sort of tastes a bit like puke lol, so I don't use this every day: I switch between a non-alcoholic Listerine that I have and this, but it has definitely helped diminish my teeth bleeding from using a water Flosser and being a smoker. Maybe next time I will try the peppermint flavour even though its more expensive than this orange one LOLI also don't find that it helps to keep your breath fresh, this really is like a carbonated orange soda that has gotten flat, but my main reason for getting this was for my bleeding gums which has definitely helped hence 4*
